data.name: Type.Required
data.value: Please specify the document type name.

data.name: Description.MaxLength
data.value: Description length must be less or equal to 255 characters.

data.name: labelIsSystem.Help
data.value: System document types have special meaning for the system work, therefore cannot be deleted, and only description and filename format can be changed for them.

data.name: labelFilenameFormat.Help
data.value: Enter JavaScript regex which will be used to validate filenames for new documents of this type. E.g. the "order_(.+)\.(pdf|od[tsp])" expression will allow PDF and LibreOffice/OpenOffice documents (ODT, ODS and ODP) which have "order_" prefix. The start "^" and end "$" tokens will be added automatically, comparison is case-sensitive. You can test your regex'es at https://regex101.com/

data.name: FilenameFormat.Invalid
data.value: Not a valid JavaScript regular expression.
